extendedInfo.description: ** PokerStars.net Poker is a free-to-play mobile app. PokerStars Real Money mobile apps are not available on Google Play **PokerStars.net has gone mobile! The worldâs largest online poker room now brings you play money games straight to your Android device, meaning you can play free poker games whenever and wherever you want. You can now compete in play money ring games, Sit & Goâs (SNGs) and multi-table tournaments (MTTs) on the go!PokerStars.net Poker offers great features, including the most advanced multi-table functionality, player table chat, lobby filters and other advanced options. You can also quickly find the tournaments you need to be in, including those your friends are playing, with the handy tournament and player search. Donât want to miss that tournament you qualified for because you wonât be at home? No problem. PokerStars.net Poker lets you connect and play using Wi-Fi or your phoneâs 3G connection, so youâll never miss a tournament again!You can also experience fast-paced play money ring games on your mobile device with Zoom! The second you fold you will instantly be taken to another table and dealt another hand. You won't find a poker experience as exhilarating as PokerStars Zoom on your mobile anywhere else!Finding a quick game is also fast. Forget browsing the lobby for a table; now you can simply use the âPlay Nowâ button from the Home Screen or the Lobby, and youâll only be a click away from a seat at the virtual felt.* PokerStars.net Poker is only for play money players 18 years old and up *What are you waiting for? Join the action now!*********************REQUIREMENTS*********************- Wi-Fi or 3G Internet connection- Android 2.2+- Minimum screen resolution of 800x480*********************FEATURES*********************â¢ Hundreds of thousands of players online every dayâ¢ Play money games available around the clockâ¢ Ring Games, Sit & Goâs and tournaments - a tournament starts every second of every day!â¢ Zoom â Fast-paced ring games now on your mobile â¢ 'Play Now' feature - quick access to your favourite gamesâ¢ Find your seat - player and tournament searchâ¢ Multi-table functionalityâ¢ Table chatâ¢ Lobby filters for all games, stakes, limits and table sizesâ¢ Advanced optionsâ¢ Tutorials, game rules, guides and FAQsâ¢ Built-in Contact Support Formâ¢ Supported languages: English, French, Russian, Spanish, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese (PT & BR), Romanian, Slovenian, Swedish, Finnish, Estonian, Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Croatian, Czech, Ukrainian, Bulgarian, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Korean, and Japanese *********************ABOUT POKERSTARS.NET*********************PokerStars.net is a fun, safe place to play poker with the largest player pool online. Weâve put together a dedicated and professional service team, and the best software with the most features to keep you playing at our site on your mobile device.*********************SEARCH KEYWORDS*********************PokerStars,Poker,Mobile,Free,Texas Hold'em,S&G,SNG,Ring,Game,Tournaments,Play,Rules,Hands,Chips,Card,Table,SNG,Casino,Omaha,PLO,NLHE,Hi-Lo,Poker Hands,Live,Real Time,Tablet,Heads-Up,EPT,Freeroll,Zoom

reviews.title: Needs serious work
reviews.comment: Why must I get booted on a gigabit wifi connection when I\'m on my phone? Constantly! Then by the time I log back in I\'ve folded/sat out. Auto-login please! With option for LOCAL SERVERS FIRST. Because this app is actually getting worse. Blah. 2 stars is probably being lenient considering how long your app has been available...
reviews.author: Michael Brabant

reviews.title: Umm
reviews.comment: So ive been playing for months all good love it then I go to login and theres an update. No problem except the update won\'t download. I try un installing and still it won\'t download!  Galaxy s3. Wtf?. Well guess you\'ve lost this daily player until you fix this!!! Now would be good.
reviews.author: Lyle Weger

reviews.title: Just like zynga
reviews.comment: This game is just like zynga. Always deals pairs . straights and flushes. Most of the time one seat wins the majority of the hands.Rigged game like all the rest of them !! Don\'t spend your money to buy theirs !!
reviews.author: Kevin Sikkenga

reviews.title: Horrid.
reviews.comment: Changed my mind.  Battery drainer.  Even when your not playing.  Quick uninstall.  Something\'s not right.
reviews.author: Dean Chermak

reviews.title: Piece of crap
reviews.comment: Can\'t even create an account cuz I can\'t get past the info on where I heard of this stupid app
reviews.author: Christian Eubanks

reviews.title: Wack! Play money only
reviews.comment: Play money only?? What the hell is happening? Used to work 1 month ago in real money, but now its play money only, this app is technically flawed!!
reviews.author: Nicky Singh

reviews.title: Good play
reviews.comment: People play as if the money was real. Better practice than most free poker games.
reviews.author: JS Brown

reviews.comment: Works fine gor the 1st few minutes I used it for until I found it its only plsy money f#$ k that! Get real money option
reviews.author: wayne shearman

reviews.title: I don\'t like it
reviews.comment: Better poker apps out there than this one all-around.
reviews.author: Andrea David

reviews.title: Was good
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed this app but now it won\'t even open.
reviews.author: jennifer anderson

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: All games have only one reserved seat, and there is only play money option. Don\'t recommend.
reviews.author: Reno Vystoklis

reviews.title: Terrible Tablet Implementation
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the iPad pokersars app and it is far superior to this one.  I hate the iPad and hate using it.  Why the difference in implementation?  example:  iPad: Tournament info is a \"pop up\" with your current table running in the background.  Nexus 7: Tournament info goes to a completely different screen with the table action muted AND it forces you to portrait mode so you have to turn your stupid tablet???  wth?  There\'s only one way to make up for this.  Make Pokerstars compatible with Chromecast.  With the bet controls on the tablet and the tables on the big screen TV!  :)
reviews.author: Michael Salva

reviews.title: Ok but....
reviews.comment: Keeps booting me off or out. I also have to keep putting my password in. Six times I did it before a tournament and by that time I folded the first two hands. Stupid!
reviews.author: Brian McDermid

reviews.title: Can\'t play.
reviews.comment: You can\'t play this at all.   Every game is full and if you try join tables they all become reserved.   You can\'t make your own games.   Total waste.     All that security and you can\'t even play a single hand once.
reviews.author: Paul Quewezance

reviews.title: Fix now
reviews.comment: Wtf I only got a tablet so I Could play poker for real money. I play poker most days now I have jus wasted \302\243240 and can\'t play real money get this sorted now!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Tomi Downie

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Great gameplay
reviews.author: Randy Trisler

reviews.title: Its poker gone mobile.
reviews.comment: First, its a FREE APP!!! Youve paid nothing for it and if it doesnt make you happy, go PAY for something that will.  Second, to all you goons crying \"ADD REAL MONEY PLAY!!!\", youre GOONS!!! Online poker for real money is ILLEGAL in the US and therefore impossible to put into this app...  Grow a brain.
reviews.author: Ruste Ryan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works just fine
reviews.author: Selene Garcia

reviews.title: Play money
reviews.comment: For all you ppl complaining about not being able to use real money. If you live within the United States and it\'s territories it is illegal. Remember they were busted a few years ago. Duh!
reviews.author: Todd Mackey

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: johnny Lee
